DOC.brief_summary: This local , multicenter , randomize , active comparator , double-blind , parallel group study extension conduct evaluate efficacy safety celecoxib versus diclofenac SR treatment Chinese patient Ankylosing Spondylitis ( AS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Celecoxib Or Diclofenac For Efficacy Safety In Chinese Patients With Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Meet 1984 Modified New York Criteria Classification Ankylosing Spondylitis With axial involvement Without peripheral joint involvement ( synovitis ) time study entry , ( exclude involvement hip , knee shoulder ) Need daily treatment NSAIDs previous 30 day study entry Known inflammatory enteropathy ( eg , ulcerative colitis , Crohn 's disease , etc ) Presence extraarticular manifestation ( eg , uveitis , endocarditis , etc . ) Known vertebral compression Need corset study
